text: @antonioguterres Awareness of the desease is most important for young generation and women, social distance, hand washing, clean yourself and your family, your street, city, and country, let's come and fight against COVID19 virus togather and save all human beings. entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
